{{Wireless embedded system |brand=LevelOne |model=WBR-6022 |revision=v1 |upc=878742007386 |ean= |asin=B0093GMB22 |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand= |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8190 |wi1_chip2_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=LevelOne |default_ssid_regex=^LevelOne$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} ''300Mbps Wireless HomeGuard 22 Gateway''
[http://global.level1.com/Home-Products/Broadband-Routers/300Mbps/WBR-6022/744.html Product page], [http://global.level1.com/downloads.php?modelstr1=WBR&modelstr2=6022&sendtype=0 Downloads]
[http://download.level1.info/manual/WBR-6022_UM_V1.41.pdf Manual]
[http://download.level1.info/datasheet/WBR-6022_SPEC_V1.0.pdf Datasheet] The device may be the same as the [[LevelOne WBR-6020]]. Per [http://download.level1.com/level1/member/marketingdocument/Broadband_and_ADSL_Router_Comparison_Table.xls this table], the device uses RTL8190.
